alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 4:42PM CST until January 19 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wintry mix of freezing rain and sleet transitioning quickly to snow. Light glaze of ice, and up to a half inch of sleet and snow possible. * WHERE...In Oklahoma, Cherokee, Adair and Sequoyah Counties. In Arkansas, Crawford and Franklin Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. In Arkansas, for the latest road conditions call 1-800-245- 1672 or go to idrivearkansas.com. In Oklahoma, for the latest road conditions call 1-844-465-4997 or go to okRoads.org.
